description: Small liquidity-buffer tightening for BANK_A via payment rules; parameters kept close to iter10 to avoid oscillation. No collateral trees used because costs are zero there.

on_true.description: Always release urgent or EOD payments to guarantee deadlines and 100% settlement.
Release when liquidity is adequate under the tightened buffer.

on_false.description: Hold to avoid unnecessary overdraft when payment is non-urgent and liquidity is tight.
For non-urgent payments, require slightly more liquidity than amount using bank-specific buffer.

payment_tree.description: Release if near deadline or in end-of-day rush, otherwise apply tighter liquidity buffer for non-urgent payments.

bank_tree.description: Keep bank-level policy simple and let payment_tree drive behavior; avoids oscillations from changing budgets.

strategic_collateral_tree.description: Do not actively manage collateral since collateral costs are currently zero.

end_of_tick_collateral_tree.description: At end of tick, keep collateral unchanged; no cost benefit to adjusting.
